item.description:
Optimize Your Natural Brand.

Start out 2012 by setting your intention to disengage from your most victimizing habits and reengage with your most empowering habits. Note: this will not about the usual New Year’s resolutions of more exercising, less unhealthy eating or sticking to a budget

 About Mira 

As a career/life mentor Mira helps to ‘get rid of the piled up gunk’ (as one client put it) that has stopped her clients from moving ahead in their work/life. So they can live their life, not their fears.

Mira’ signature program, “Branding with Spirit” helps you to:

v  Embrace and share your delicious essence 

v  Delight in how you add unique value to others and

v  See marketing as an opportunity to show up fully as YOU!

Mira’s mentoring, coaching and consulting is rooted in extensive business experience and a deep commitment to her spiritual practice.
